codfis: - Calculate the fiscal code based on the data provided
weather: *city* - Shows informations about the weather in the city entered
crypto: *currency* - Show informations on the inserted cryptocurrency
report: - Send suggestions or bugs to solve to the bot creator
twitch: *streamer* - Show informations about the Twitch streamer
anime: *anime* - Shows informations about the entered anime
manga: *manga* - Show informations about the entered manga
steam: *nickname* - Show informations on the Steam profile
steamgame: *game* - Show informations on a Steam game
srk: *player* - Show informations about the player of a fighting game
srkgame: *game* - Shows the first 10 classified in a fighting game
srktour: *tournament* - Shows informations about a brawler tournament
overwatch: - Show informations on the Overwatch profile
ytinfo: *id* or *nickname* - Show information on the YouTube channel
